content: make 1 left a left leaning increase repeat sts 1-8 on chart c row 1 until 1 st m1r - make 1 right a right leaning increase remains before the gap ssk with the colour p - purl that is next on chart c on needle 2 continue pm - place marker the stranded colourwork pattern according to p2tog - purl 2 stitches together chart c on needle 1 k2tog with the colour round s - round s that is next on chart c and finish the round by rs - right side working the stranded colourwork pattern sl - slip according to chart c there are now 64 72 ssk - slip slip knit 80 sts in total and chart c row 1 has been st s - stitch es repeated 8 9 10 times on the round ws - wrong side w&t - wrap and turn trailing daisy page 3/5 chart c chart a chart b chart key trailing daisy page 4/5 links to video tutorials lifted left increase knitwise https //www youtube com/watch v=ffcjg7mezh0 lifted left increase purlwise https //www youtube com/watch v=grbyxkc3pvc rs knitted shadow wraps https //www youtube com/watch v=u3xzz5n9kpy ws purled shadow wraps https //www youtube com/watch v=ckztlhcqhyw m1r knitwise https //www youtube com/watch v=gz40vvswl5a m1l knitwise https //www youtube com/watch v=pdzasvi9_sc wrap and turn knitwise https //www youtube com/watch v=mrnc7lehy4y wrap and turn purlwise https //www youtube com/watch v=etekehniphw mc rva silmusolmu villa sukkis in joulu colourway cc ikke bfl sock in mithril colourway trailing daisy page 5/5
